DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1 . To evaluate long-term safety dabigatran etexilate 2 . To assess effect knowledge translation intervention patient outcome
DOC.brief_title: RELY-ABLE Long Term Multi-center Extension Dabigatran Treatment Patients With Atrial Fibrillation Who Completed RE-LY Trial
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Participation RELY , require long term anticoagulation , provide write informed consent Exclusion criterion : Permanent discontinuation dabigatran RELY
